subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Carlos Bocanegra, a former captain of the United States’ national team who now plays for Chivas U.S.A., said he would retire at the end of the Major League Soccer season.
snippet: Carlos Bocanegra, a former captain of the United States’ national team who now plays for Chivas U.S.A., said he would retire at the end of the Major League Soccer season.
